overview:
Argam is a co-founders of Creative Citizen and currently serves as its Chief Information Officer.

Argam started his career in the internet industry at Submit Express Inc., one of the leading search engine optimization firms, developing their search engine based marketing strategies. His involvement in socially conscious endeavors has included working for the UC Berkeley Center for Labor Research and the U.S. Agency for International Development. He was legal extern to the Honorable Judge Geraldine Mund, U.S. Bankruptcy Court, Central District of California. He was admitted to the State Bar of California in November of 2007 and is also a practicing attorney.

Argam contributed to leading blogs including VentureBeat.com and TriplePundit.com. He also consults startups about technology, monetization, and legal matters.
